Name: David Warner
Teams: Australia, Delhi Capitals, New South Wales, Middlesex, Cricket Australia Chairmans XI, Sydney Thunder, Sydney Sixers, Australians, Sunrisers Hyderabad, Winnipeg Hawks, Saint Lucia Kings, Sylhet Sixers, Australia A, Finch XI, Cummins XI, Southern Brave
Bio: David Warner's extraordinary batting feats in all three formats for Australia will forever be overshadowed by his role as the architect of the Newls ball-tampering scal in 2018  his place as a central figure in Australian cricket's ensuing cultural crisis,Warner was charged as the man who instructed team-mate Cameron Bancroft to use spaper on the ball in the infamous Cape Town Test,Although he was not charged by the ICC he was banned from international  Australian domestic cricket by Cricket Australia for 12 months,He was stripped of the vice-captaincy  banned from leadership roles for life
